document_data.name: Luanna's Forge
document_data.mainbody: '''Luanna's Forge''' was a forge and blacksmith shop located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The forge was located in south Zhentil Keep in the western section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] in between [[Teshwave Street]] and [[Center Street]].
document_data.Activities: The forge offered common services including [[armor]] and weapon repair and making [[horseshoe]]s and common tools and metal objects. The work done here was by far the best to be found within the entire city, and the prices reflected that quality.
document_data.Inhabitants: Luanna's Forge was owned by a muscular woman named [[Luanna]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
